source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a narrow mountain trail, weaving between large boulders and patches of wildflowers. In the background, a herd of goats crosses the path, causing the cyclists to slow down and wait. One cyclist dismounts to help guide the goats away from the trail before the group continues their ride.
